knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Load Packages

```{r libraries, echo = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(leaflet)
library(dplyr)

```

## Data Import

```{r data-import, echo = FALSE}

# read csv

pcp_df <- read_csv("data/primary care providers/maine_primary_care.csv")

# glimpse data

glimpse(pcp_df)

```

```{r initial-data-exploration}

# best rated PCPs

pcp_df %>%
  select(title, rating, reviewCount, address) %>%
  arrange(desc(rating)) %>%
  slice_max(rating, n = 35)

```
